frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-activities-menu-for-apps-and-windows
frozen.shortDescription: This extension turns the Activities button into a popup menu with icons for selecting either Applications or Workspaces in the Overview. Selecting the same view again will hide the overview.
frozen.longDescription:
This extension turns the Activities button into a popup menu with icons for selecting either Applications or Workspaces in the Overview. Selecting the same view again will hide the overview.

This is particularly useful for tablet users that find the Activities button difficult to click on, whereas a menu can be more easily invoked.
